uts.wsd.teamtwo.JAXB

Class Hotels

  • java.lang.Object
    • uts.wsd.teamtwo.JAXB.Hotels
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Hotels
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The DTO that describes a collection of Hotel. Used for database storage, manipulation and XSLT display.
    Author:
    Deinyon L Davies
    See Also:
    Hotel, Serialized Form

      An interface for writing custom hotel filtering functions.

    • Method Detail

      • filterById

        public Hotels filterById(int hotelId)
        Filters the list to a collection of one Hotel with the given ID. Used for XSLT transformation where a single Hotel is required
        Parameters:
        hotelId - The ID number of the Hotel to display
        Returns:
        A collection of one Hotel with the given ID number

      • filterByFunc

        public Hotels filterByFunc(Hotels.FilterFunction filterFunc)
        Filters the collection of Hotel given a FilterFunction. Allows complex definition of filtering types with minimal duplicated code.
        Parameters:
        filterFunc - The FilterFunction that defines the filter to apply
        Returns:
        The filtered collection of Hotels
        See Also:
        Hotels.FilterFunction

      • filterByName

        public Hotels filterByName(java.lang.String name)
        Filters the collection by a partial search string. The search string need only contain a portion of the Hotel name to search. IE, "inn" will return a collection that contains "Brilliant Inn" and "Inn Side"
        Parameters:
        name - The partial name of the hotel to search
        Returns:
        A collection of Hotels that match the given search query

      • filterByCountry

        public Hotels filterByCountry(java.lang.String country)
        Filters the collection of Hotel by country name
        Parameters:
        country - The country in which the hotel should exist
        Returns:
        The collection of Hotel that exists in the specified country

      • filterByCity

        public Hotels filterByCity(java.lang.String city)
        Filters the collection of Hotel by city name
        Parameters:
        city - The city in which the hotel should exist
        Returns:
        The collection of Hotel that exists in the specified city

      • getHotel

        public Hotel getHotel(int hotelId)
        Parameters:
        hotelId - The ID of the Hotel to obtain
        Returns:
        The Hotel with the given ID number

      • getList

        public java.util.ArrayList<Hotel> getList()
        Obtains the entire collection of Hotel as an ArrayList
        Returns:
        The complete collection of Hotels
